department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Installation of a new dishwashing system in the Bureau of Infrastructure and Economics, operated by the Department of the Treasury Board.

full_summary:
### W0107-23C205: Dishwasher System Removal and Installation Request for Proposal

### Procurement Information

* **Reference Number**: WS3694270550
* **Amendment Number**: 0
* **Publication Date**: February 1, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 16, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: February 20, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2023

### Description

The Government of Canada seeks proposals from individuals and businesses to remove an existing dishwashing system and install a new one at the Normandy Court Kitchen (NCK) in Garrison Petawawa. The existing system must be dismantled and removed, while the new one must be assembled and installed in the Dispersed Meals Room 510.

### Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria

This is a **Request for Proposal (RFP)** under the **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**. The lowest cost-per-point method will be used to evaluate proposals.

### Contact Information

For any inquiries or to submit bids, please contact:

* Darlene Keenan (SPAC/PSPC)
* darlene.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15280563?extsite=MTUyODA1NjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==]

### Website

The website hosting the RFP can be accessed at the above link. Please disregard any information provided by Ariba Discovery or Canada Buys. All bid submissions must be made through the above platform.

### Important Notes

* All bids must be submitted by 2:00 PM EST on February 16, 2023 to be considered.
* Any bids submitted after the closing time may be deemed non-responsive. 
* It is the responsibility of the bidder to ensure that all terms and conditions are met before submission.

### Contracting Entity Information

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
* Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

### End-User Entity Information

* Department of National Defence (DND)
* 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada
